name: Comfort Suites Seven Mile Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place isn't as flashy as some it's more upscale neighbors, but they work hard to provide their guests with a clean , comfortable vacation setting. The pool is somewhat small, but we never had a problem finding lounge chairs. The same goes for the beach area, which is just a about a hundred feet down a path from the pool. The restaurant/bar area by the pool had decent food and drinks at reasonable prices, with daily specials. Beach towels are provided free of charge, but must be signed out at the front desk. The free continental breakfast was pretty good, with indoor/outoor seating just off the lobby. We had a studio suite, which is the cheapest room available, and found it to have ample space. there was a small sittting area with a couch and a kitchen area with a coffee maker, toaster, microwave, and fridge. Housekeeping service was excellent.
reviews.title: Good value on Seven Mile Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had a couple of minor complaints. We found the mattress in our room too soft for our liking. If you are into firm mattresses, as we are, this could be an issue. We also found the soundproofing of the room to be insufficient. Several times during our six night stay, we were awakened by late night conversations in other rooms. There's a construction project going on between the hotel and the beach, so it gets little noisy during the day. I would estimate that this project will take most of the winter to complete.
reviews.title: Stunning beach and great staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you're not too picky, this place is an excellent value. The Marriott next door costs about double, and yes, it is very nice. But you will spend a lot of money on food and drink there. We went over there a couple of times to look at their turtle pond, and we booked our excursions through their tour desk.
reviews.title: Comfort Suites quite disappointing

reviews.text: This was our first time in Grand Cayman, we have been to alot of islands and the one thing we look for is a beautiful beach and crystal blue water.
reviews.title: Not too bad at all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is located on Seven Mile Beach which is stunning, white sand and the water was great, especially when we snorkled along the shoreline.
reviews.title: Nice Place and Value for Grand Cayman

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ---Comfort Suites Grand Cayman is on the Georgetown end of Seven Mile Beach. The hotel is clean, pleasant, and a great deal for the price. Our small studio had a queen bed, microwave, fridge, great air conditioning and a large shower with plenty of water pressure. Maid service was fine, staff were friendly, no smoking in the hotel, and a great continental breakfast is included (waffles, muffins, fruit, yogurt, juice, cereal).
reviews.title: Great location, great price!
Surprisingly good value and stay
reviews.text: ---The hotel is set back about 75 feet from the beach. When you walk that 75 feet out from the pool, you're on an amazingly beautiful beach. Most rooms will not have an ocean view, but I'd still call it "beachfront". The hotel is close to fast food and fancy food, shopping in Georgetown is a 5 minute drive, there is a dive shop on site for dive or snokel tours (Stingray City is a must), and all in all I'd say it's a great low-priced hotel. I'd go back in a minute! If you want luxury and a view of the sunset from your room, stay somewhere else. If you want clean, bargain priced, close to everything, and a truly beautiful beach that's 75 feet away from the pool, stay at the Comfort Suites!
My sister and I booked a studio suite at the Comfort Suites, it was surprosingly good, clean rooms, great location where we could walk to the beach, and all for a good price.
reviews.title: Wonderful

description: Stay with someone you know. The hotel enjoys an excellent location beachside in the heart of Seven Mile Beach area close to restaurants, bars and shopping and with breakfast and basic wi-fi access included offering excellent value to the traveller on Seven Mile Beach. While not a beachfront property guests access the beach by a small path a few feet from the back door. The hotel offers 5 suite types: 2-bedroom, 1-bedroom with full kitchen as well as Business Pool View King Studios, Deluxe Studio with 2 beds and Queen Studios each with kitchenette are ideal for any size of family and budget. Onsite Restaurant and Dive Shop with snorkel trips to Stingray City offers convenience at your door step. Best location, best value on Seven Mile.
